channel.title: The Bug of No Exiting
channel.description:
#### What happened? Uh herm, this has already been reported before, but I need to rebump this, you can't press X on the game or else the program freezes.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The program should close when you press X, it shouldn't freeze.
#### Steps to reproduce: Press X while at the main menu, or literally anywhere else.
#### Comments: It's getting to be a pain in my rearend having to open Task Manager to close ToL.
_edit:_ This bug has been here since I remember, in pre-alpha even, but now it's really starting to become intolerable, for a while it was just a kick in the butt, but now that foot is stuck in the butt if you know what I mean. :(
